subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The end of an era for San Francisco’s ballpark by the bay begins with the 49ers’ opener against Green Bay on Sept. 8 and ends in demolition after the N.F.L. season.
snippet: The end of an era for San Francisco’s ballpark by the bay begins with the 49ers’ opener against Green Bay on Sept. 8 and ends in demolition after the N.F.L. season.
